name: playground-series-s5e2
data_intro: Predict the price of backpacks given various attributes.

cat_feature_intro.Brand: Brand of the backpack, which can influence price.
cat_feature_intro.Material: Material of the backpack (e.g., leather, nylon).
cat_feature_intro.Size: Size of the backpack (e.g., small, large).
cat_feature_intro.Laptop Compartment: Whether the backpack has a laptop compartment.
cat_feature_intro.Waterproof: Indicates if the backpack is waterproof.
cat_feature_intro.Style: Style of the backpack (e.g., casual, sports).

num_feature_intro.Price: Target feature: the price of the backpack.
num_feature_intro.Compartments: Number of compartments in the backpack.
num_feature_intro.Weight Capacity (kg): Maximum weight the backpack can carry.
